mapper.select: select * from i_industy where parentId = 0 order by id asc
select * from i_industy where parentId != 0 order by id asc
select userId,nickName from u_user where parentId = #{parentId}
select userId,nickName from u_user where userLevel = 3
select count(0) from a_app where appName = #{appName}
select u.parentId from a_app a,u_user u where a.appId = #{appId} and a.userId = u.userId
mapper.update: update a_app set appStatus = #{appStatus} where appId = #{appId}
mapper.insert: insert into a_adspace (spaceId, appId, spaceType, createTime, spaceName, width, height) values (#{spaceId},#{appId},#{spaceType},now(),#{spaceName},#{width},#{height})
mapper.select: select u.parentId,a.appId from a_adspace d,a_app a,u_user u where d.spaceId = #{spaceId} and d.appId = a.appId and a.userId = u.userId

select u.parentId,a.appId,d.spaceId,t.upstreamAppId from a_adspace d,a_app a,u_user u,a_upstream t where t.upstreamId = #{upstreamId} and t.spaceId = d.spaceId and d.appId = a.appId and a.userId = u.userId
mapper.insert: insert into a_upstream (upstreamId, spaceId, upstreamType, upstreamAppId, upstreamPackageName, createTime, probability, upstreamAppName, upstreamWidth, upstreamHeight) values (#{upstreamId},#{spaceId},#{upstreamType},#{upstreamAppId},#{upstreamPackageName},#{createTime},#{probability},#{upstreamAppName},#{upstreamWidth},#{upstreamHeight})
insert into a_adspace_upstream (spaceId, upstreamId, upstreamType, startTime) values (#{spaceId},#{upstreamId},#{upstreamType},now())
mapper.select: select u.*,DATE_FORMAT(u.createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as create_Time,t.`name` from a_upstream u,a_upstream_type t where u.spaceId = #{spaceId} and u.upstreamType = t.type
mapper.insert:
insert into a_statistics (spaceId, appId, upstreamId, createTime, beforeLookPV, beforeClickNum, beforeIncome, lookPV, clickNum, clickProbability, income, ecmp) values
(#{item.spaceId},#{item.appId},#{item.upstreamId},#{item.createTime},#{item.beforeLookPV},#{item.beforeClickNum},#{item.beforeIncome},#{item.lookPV},#{item.clickNum},#{item.clickProbability},#{item.income},#{item.ecmp})
mapper.select: select count(0) from a_upstream_type
mapper.insert: insert into a_upstream_type (type, name, shortName, createTime, status) values (#{type},#{name},#{shortName},#{createTime},#{status})
mapper.select: select a.upstreamId,a.upstreamAppId,a.name,p.appId,d.spaceId,d.spaceName,p.appName,a.probability,a.upstreamPackageName from (SELECT u.upstreamId,u.upstreamAppId,t.name,u.upstreamType,u.spaceId,u.upstreamPackageName,u.probability FROM a_upstream u,a_upstream_type t where u.upstreamType = t.type and u.upstreamId = #{upstreamId}) a LEFT JOIN a_adspace d on a.spaceId = d.spaceId LEFT JOIN a_app p on d.appId = p.appId
select t.upstreamDivided as dividedX,a.dividedY,a.dividedZ from a_upstream u,a_adspace a,a_upstream_type t where u.upstreamId = #{upstreamId} and u.spaceId = a.spaceId and u.upstreamType = t.type
select * from a_upstream where upstreamId = #{upstreamId}
select u.*,t.`name` as upstreamName from a_report_upstream u,a_upstream_type t where u.downstreamReportId = #{downstreamReportId} and u.upstreamType = t.type
select r.*,t.`name` as upstreamName from a_report r,a_upstream_type t where r.appId = #{appId} and r.slotId = #{slotId} and TO_DAYS(r.createTime) = TO_DAYS(#{createTime}) and r.upstreamType = t.type
select a.appName,d.spaceName from a_adspace d,a_app a where d.spaceId = #{spaceId} and d.appId = a.appId
delete from a_statistics where statisticsId = #{statisticsId}

update.foreach: update a_upstream set probability = #{item.probability} where spaceId = #{item.spaceId} and upstreamType = #{item.upstreamType}

mapper.select:
select u.nickName,ap.appId,ap.appName,ad.spaceId,ad.dividedY,au.upstreamId,DATE_FORMAT(au.startTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTime,IFNULL(au.endTime,NOW()) as endTime from a_adspace_upstream au,a_adspace ad,a_app ap,u_user u where au.spaceId = ad.spaceId and ad.appId = ap.appId and ap.userId = u.userId and au.upstreamId in
#{item}

select u.nickName,ap.appId,ap.appName,ad.spaceId,ad.dividedY,au.upstreamId,au.startTime,IFNULL(au.endTime,NOW()) as endTime from a_adspace_upstream au,a_adspace ad,a_app ap,u_user u where au.spaceId = ad.spaceId and ad.appId = ap.appId and ap.userId = u.userId and au.upstreamId in
#{item}
